keyword: how many calories are in a cinnamon roll
title: How Many Calories Are in a Cinnamon Roll?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a cinnamon roll, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and easy tweaks for variations under 160 characters.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Cinnamon Roll?
assumptions: Standard store-bought cinnamon roll with icing, average size (~88 g), baked, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cinnamon roll contains about 245 calories, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a cinnamon roll without icing?
faqs.a: About 195 calories, reducing sugars and fat.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Around 38 g total carbs, including 20 g sugars per roll.

faqs.q: Is a cinnamon roll high in protein?
faqs.a: No, typically only 3 g protein per roll.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Larger rolls can have 300+ kcal; smaller ones under 200 kcal.

faqs.q: Are cinnamon rolls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 250 mg per roll from dough and filling.
